content: Our games and product development machine has been reinforced with top content partners and complemented with tier one customers, partnerships with leading companies like Bluberi and Galaxy Gaming, produced online-first games and deployed with blue chip operators in the U.S. and Europe, including our newly launched turnkey partners, the Netherlands and the Czech Republic. Your line is open. Your line is open. Weâre changing the number of proprietary games, weâre putting more development resources behind them, so weâve established them again, as we outlined, in record time, we were able to re-group or re-establish two new studios around the resources that were in the company acquired through the U.S. acquisitions, and weâre building around them, so more developers, more game production, more authentications in more territories, also separating between the EU and the U.S. production lines, and thatâs the reason why weâre looking to increase both production and deployment, because deploying in regulated territories is not a trivial task, and weâre streamlining that process so we can do more with the existing resources. Some U.S. games are accepted well - weâve seen some Atomic Slot Lab games received well in the U.K. and other territories, but generally speaking, weâre trying to cater for each market, and if we get the benefit of transferability, thatâs great, but we assume that the players in each market sort of have their own tastes, especially when you talk about central Europe versus the U.S. Maybe one last one from me and then Iâll pass the line.
